Topic.Title: Unable to save game on window 10

Posts.EditableText: When trying to save the game on my local copy of Quest on Win 10, I get the message: Unable to save the file due to the following error: access to the path is denied. I checked security properties for the quest directory and I have full read/write access.
Posts.HTML: When trying to save the game on my local copy of Quest on Win 10, I get the message: Unable to save the file due to the following error: access to the path is denied. I checked security properties for the quest directory and I have full read/write access.

Posts.EditableText: Have you tried saving at another location, like your desktop?
Posts.HTML: Have you tried saving at another location, like your desktop?
